TITLE: Survey Course
TASK: The Survey Course pattern provides a field-specific overview, presenting a broad understanding of main topics, debates, and methodologies. This pattern instigates interest, nurtures contextual understanding, and readies learners for deeper dives into specialized topics. The challenge is ensuring the overview doesn't oversimplify or neglect essential field aspects. The pattern is most successful when it stimulates curiosity and encourages further inquiry, rather than aiming for comprehensive detail.
